name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Automation Engineer with 13+ years of experience primarily focused on Quality Assurance and Automation in high-performance applications within the healthcare and financial sectors. Expert in **Java**, **JavaScript**, **C#**, **Golang**, and test automation tools such as **Selenium** and **JUnit**. Adept in implementing UI and API testing strategies, ensuring alignment with Agile methodologies and Test-Driven Development practices.
Highly skilled in developing seamless user interfaces with **HTML**, **CSS**, and manipulating the DOM, while leveraging **Git** for version control.
Demonstrated ability in deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**, implementing CI/CD pipelines, and utilizing modern frameworks like **React**, **Next.js**, and **Vue** for frontend solutions. Strong background in MLOps and building AI/ML-powered platforms that enhance predictive analytics and automation, leveraging tools such as **FastAPI**, **Django**, **MLflow**, and **Airflow**. Committed to compliance-driven development practices, aligning solutions with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards.
